message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of significant value to you. While I can't disclose the exact details at this point, I assure you it's worth well over $1000000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a substantial discount from its true potential value. If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss further. If not, I have another buyer lined up at $1000000.
